column1: #Text=Thank you for agreeing to the interview .
#Text=So ma'am would you please tell us about yourself ?
#Text=My name is Vanesa and I live in Miami , Florida [ United States ] .
#Text=And I am an illustrator for comics .
#Text=Um , my current work is called Redlands and it 's a horror book .
#Text=Since when did you start [ ... ] drawing concept arts and got into comics ?
#Text=Concept art : I started working on that right after I went to school .

#Text=I got a job at an animation studio , and then there I did concept art like cartoon design , paintings , story boarding ; and then while I was working there , a publisher approached me and they wanted me to work on a series for them .
#Text=And I said , " Yeah " , and that 's how I got into comics .
#Text=Like I , it was : I just got an email one day . [ Laughs ]
#Text=So , what was your first job like ?
#Text=It was ... it was a big learning experience .
#Text=I had never done anything long term , you know ?
#Text=Like I was just used to just doing a couple of pages .
#Text=But this was , like , a long series .
#Text=So I learned a lot about my process and how to be more efficient , you know .
#Text=With time , especially , because I was taking too long doing the work , because I did n't have a process set .
#Text=So it was a big learning experience .
#Text=How much time does it [ drawing concept art ] take ?
#Text=Because you go through so many options , so many , like trial and errors .
#Text=And you do n't know what you are look for .

#Text=You sort of like have to search and , like , look at a lot of things and do a lot of , you know , a lot of work , to find the final thing that matches with what you are trying to express , you know .
#Text=So , it takes a long time . [ Laughs ]
#Text=What are the projects that you have worked on ?
#Text=Okay so I started with Boom ! Studios , and with them , I did this series called Hit .
#Text=Then , with them I did a series called The Empty Man .
#Text=And after that , I did the Scarlet Witch , I think .
#Text=Then after that I did Spider-Women , and I did a little bit of Constantine Hellblazer .
#Text=And after that I have been working on Redlands .
#Text=What work are you most proud of ?
#Text=I would say : my project Redlands , right now it 's my most , the one I am most proud of because it 's all mine , it 's all my work .
#Text=It 's not something that 's already been created , you know ?
